process_id.title: Process ID
process_id.description: Identifier for the process to be used.

atom_id.title: Atom ID
atom_id.description: Identifier for the atom involved in the process.

url.title: URL
url.description: The endpoint URL for the extractor.

start_time.title: Start Time
start_time.description: The start time for the process in ISO 8601 format. Not required but defaults to yesterday datetime in UTC

end_time.title: End Time
end_time.description: The end time for the job process in ISO 8601 format. Not required but defaults to current datetime in UTC
